item.title: Drupal Memcache
item.description: Had to install as follows (need to be php7.x): 1pecl install memcached Dependencies may need to be installed 1# yum groupinstall "Development tools" 2# yum install zlib zlib-devel 3# yum install php php-devel php-pear 4echo "extension=memcache.so" >> /etc/php.d/memcache.ini See https://tecadmin.net/install-memcached-with-pecl-memcache-on-centos-rhel/ For Ubuntu 16.x (with php5.6.x) 1apt-get install memcached 2apt-get install php-memcache
